history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Oakland
TTS Okay, going to south oakland. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Overbrook
TTS Okay, leaving from overbrook. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER I'd like to be there by 7 a.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 06:47 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say CHANGE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 52 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 9 mins to Glenbury St Ramp at South Busway. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the Y47 to Wood St at Third avenue FS. It will depart at 7:03am. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 1 min to Fourth avenue at Wood St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 57 to Second avenue at Pittsburgh Tech Ctr . . It will depart at 7:32am. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to South Oakland, Pittsburgh, PA, USA. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER restart
